divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home from a Christmas Party when I noticed 3 vertically linear lights in the sky. I first thought they were planes but realized that they were clustered too close together and were stationary. We pulled into a parking lot to observe them. Within a few minutes they winked out one at a time.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around December 24th 2012
Summary: Noticed 3 vertically linear lights in the sky while driving. Stopped to observe.
